description: Cancels a job in an Batch job queue. Jobs that are in a SUBMITTED, PENDING, or RUNNABLE state are cancelled and the job status is updated to FAILED. Jobs that progressed to the STARTING or RUNNING state aren't canceled. However, the API operation still succeeds, even if no job is canceled. These jobs must be terminated with the  TerminateJob operation.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The Batch job ID of the job to cancel.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: A message to attach to the job that explains the reason for canceling it. This message is returned by future  DescribeJobs operations on the job. It is also recorded in the Batch activity logs. This parameter has as limit of 1024 characters.
